FuncDef: The display snmp-agent statistics command displays SNMP messages statistics. The display snmp-agent statistics command displays SNMP messages statistics.
ExtraInfo:
To view statistics about SNMP messages, run the display snmp-agent statistics command. The command output contains information about the communication between the SNMP agent and NM station for fault identification.
In an SNMP management system, an NM station and an SNMP agent exchange SNMP messages as follows:
